title: Platform Insurance - Your audience
content:
Terms of Services are scary. Long pages of legal mumbo-jumbo that no one ever reads. We all scroll down to the bottom and hit accept without a thought. Normally, it won't matter. You'll go on to use the software/service with no issues. This isn't quite the case with social media platforms.

Growing an audience on a platform generally requires diligent effort; often requiring years of work to build a sizable following. The landscape of terms Their terms of services are constantly changing and are generally applied indiscriminately.
